Terrain::TerrainNormalMap2

Terrain::TerrainNormalMap2 Class Reference

This class implements the normal map resource for the terrain block 2 It handles creation of normal maps and also streaming of hight quality maps when needed. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements the normal map resource for the terrain block 2 It handles creation of normal maps and also streaming of hight quality maps when needed.
